moonlightgecko.title: Moonlight Gecko
moonlightgecko.quote: That shining tail! Its so pretty... I want to touch it... I want to be its best friend... *gasp* I almost fell for it!
moonlightgecko.locations:
Rotten Vale: Sector 11 and 13
Elders Recess: Sector 7 and 8

pilothare.title: Pilot Hare
pilothare.quote: Ooh, this is a rare one! Its warm to the touch like a little ball of sunshine! I bet this little guy just LOVES picnics!
pilothare.locations:
Ancient Forest: Sector 1 and 8
Wildspire Waste: Sector 1

dappercoralbird.title: Dapper Coralbird
dappercoralbird.quote: Coralbirds only allow one chosen male into their flock. In other words, this guys the top dog- or bird.... You know what I mean!

wigglerqueen.title: Wiggler Queen
wigglerqueen.quote: This empress of the night only appears when theres a full moon! Let's see if she'll deign to show us her royal feet... URRGH! Nope...

forestpteryx.title: Forest Pteryx
forestpteryx.quote: Im so excited my hands are shaking... Its red crown...and that blue plumage! To think it was in the Ancient Forest all along!

emeraldhelmcrab.title: Emerald Helmcrab
emeraldhelmcrab.quote: That avant-garde shell design, that superb silhouette and color scheme... Forget research, Im getting out my sketch book!
emeraldhelmcrab.locations:
Wildspire Waste: Sector 4, 9 and 10
Rotten Vale: Sector 9

augurfly.title: Augurfly
augurfly.quote: They only emerge on rainy days, and its said that the day after is guaranteed to be sunny! Theyre like good weather charms!
augurfly.locations:
Ancient Forest: Sector 3, 5, 10, 11 and 16.
Wildspire Waste: Sector 2, 3 and 10
Coral Highlands: Sector 8, 11 and 14
Rotten Vale: Sector 1 and 12

phantomflutterfly.title: Phantom Flutterfly
phantomflutterfly.quote: These magnificent wings! Their rainbow glow is so alluring... I...I cant tear my eyes away from it! What a masterpiece!

prismhercudrome.title: Prism Hercudrome
prismhercudrome.quote: This is the... I... How in the WORLD did you manage to... Ooh, the colors... One, two... four... Its blinding me with rainbow colors!
prismhercudrome.locations:
Ancient Forest: Sector 1
Wildspire Waste: Sector 10
Coral Highlands: Sector 11
Rotten Vale: Sector 11
Elders Recess: Sector 3

goldhercudrome.title: Gold Hercudrome
goldhercudrome.quote: The Bringer of Light? The Bug of Brilliant Gold? I...Im speechless! My...my heart feels like its been dipped in golden bliss!
goldhercudrome.locations:
Ancient Forest: Sector 6
Wildspire Waste: Sector 5

downycrake.title: Downy Crake
downycrake.quote: You caught a Downy Crake!? They've been seen on the backs of monsters before, but you're the first person EVER to catch one!
downycrake.locations:
Ancient Forest: Sector 1 and 8
Wildspire Waste: Sector 1, 4 and 8
Coral Highlands: Sector 11 and 13

bristlycrake.title: Bristly Crake
bristlycrake.quote: Great jumping Jagras! A Bristly Crake!? The fleet-footed bird of legend...right before my very eyes! Someone pinch me...
bristlycrake.locations:
Rotten Vale: Sectors 3, 5 and 15
Elders Recess: Sectors 5 and 11

giantvigorwasp.title: Giant Vigorwasp
giantvigorwasp.quote: Its nectar has stronger healing properties than average, and it even releases a healing mist when its sac is ruptured!

petricanth.title: Petricanth
petricanth.quote: Unbelievable... Youve managed to fish up the legendary, thought-to-have-gone-extinct Petricanths! I take my hat off to you!
petricanth.locations:
Rotten Vale: Sector 15
Elders Recess: Sector 8

platinumfish.title: Platinumfish
platinumfish.quote: Platinum-scaled cave-dwellers, theyll hightail it if you wiggle your bait! Youre going to need a lot of patience if you want to catch one.

kingmarlin.title: King Marlin
kingmarlin.quote: I knew that these are known to approach the shore in search of prey, but great job catching it! And not losing your pole in the process!

goldcalappa.title: Gold Calappa
goldcalappa.quote: Look at the shell on this thing! It makes me just wanna pick it up and scream 'big gold haul coming through'!
